data.title: Canyon to participate in the 145th NGAUS Conference August 18
data.meta_description: Prescott, AZ – Canyon AeroConnect announced today that it will exhibit at the 145th NGAUS Conference in Reno, NV August 18-21, 2023  Visit us to learn how we can help to improve tactical communications with our FlexComm™ RT-7000 Tactical Radio, RT-5000 Transceiver and Digital Audio Comms System (DACS). Visit Canyon AeroConnect at the show.  You […]
data.text:
Prescott, AZ – Canyon AeroConnect announced today that it will exhibit at the 145th NGAUS Conference in Reno, NV August 18-21, 2023 Visit us to learn how we can help to improve tactical communications with our FlexComm™ RT-7000 Tactical Radio, RT-5000 Transceiver and Digital Audio Comms System (DACS).

Visit Canyon AeroConnect at the show. You can also schedule a Meeting with Us using the form below.
